title: Random Disconnections Using Mobile Broadband
body:
Hey Guys,

I recently just got a mobile broadband stick from Vodafone, but now every time I get halfway through a game I get this random disconnect, my ping doesn't raise and its not my internet connection it's just this random crash. When it happens I quit out of League then immediately log back in and its back to normal working perfectly fine. Does anyone know what I could do to fix this?

Thanks Raden

replies.body:
Hey Raden, 

Please try the solutions provided in the [**Troubleshooting Connection Issues**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) Riot Games Support article!
